text: Jacques Rozier (; 10 November 1926 - 31 May 2023) was a French movie director and screenwriter. He was one of the known members of the French New Wave movement and worked with Jean-Luc Godard. Three of his movies have been screened at the Cannes Film Festival. In 1978, he was a member of the jury at the 28th Berlin International Film Festival. Rozier was born in Paris, France. Rozier died on 31 May 2023 at the age of 96. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Biography on newwavefilm.com * cineresources.com archive of articles Category:1926 births Category:2023 deaths Category:French movie directors Category:French screenwriters Category:Writers from Paris
title: Jacques Rozier
